version_description:
New quick start bar for newbie meditation users
New background music
Visual improvements for iPhone X

The Meditation App is now in SPANISH! We believe that meditation is an intimate experience so it is best experienced when done in your own language. Therefore we released the Spanish version. Now you can listen to more than 100 meditations both in English and Spanish :)

Only after we’ve stepped outside our comfort zone that we begin to change, grow, and transform. That is why we created ‘Daily Meditations’.
If you have not tried yet, now you can find a fresh meditation everyday to step outside your comfort zone. Also don’t forget to try Anxiety and Deep Sleep!

Big changes are coming. Stay tuned:)
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

Back to school and work period is here! It is time to relax, focus on what motivates you and take action with calmness. Let new opportunities take you to different journeys this year.

Meditopia's new independent Watch app is finally here!
Meditopia's experience on Apple Watch now enables you to:
Sign-in with Apple to provide increased security.
Use all of Meditopia's audio-based content directly from your Apple Watch with remote streaming capabilities.

This updates quote is as follows:
"Sometimes what looks like an obstacle in your path is actually a gift meant to move you in a different direction."
Jane Lee Logan

In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

We'll end our update with a quote that resonates with us:
In the end, people will judge you anyway. So don’t live your life impressing others. Live your life impressing yourself.
Eunice Camacho Infante"
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

New year, new resolutions!

These days, we're hearing this phrase a lot and it lights a little fire of motivation under us! The transition from one year to another creates this perception that we can leave old habits, places, or people behind and welcome a new approach to living a fuller life.

In reality, we change continuously, though we're usually not aware since it tends to happen gradually, day by day. This continuous change creates in us a willingness to adopt new habits, but that doesn't necessarily mean we have the willpower to maintain those habits. The great thing about the new year is that it gives us that extra push to launch us into a new lifestyle, with healthier, more wholesome habits.

But just in case the New Year's resolution frenzy isn't enough to get you motivated, we've created a new and improved "Challenges" feature. With this tool, especially designed with you in mind, you can track how many meditations you complete, and even participate in monthly challenges to strengthen your willpower.

As mindful meditation practitioners, you already know that life is a flow full of changes and transformation. With practice, you'll also find that surrendering to this flow is all you need to drive you forward. So do this challenge for yourself; make the decision to deepen your practice and release yourself into a more mindful and fulfilling lifestyle.

While waiting for your update to load, we'll leave you with this quote: "Everything is temporary. Emotions, thoughts, people, and scenery. Do not become attached. Just flow with it."

Hi!

We've been working hard to improve your experience. Here's what we've done so far: we re-designed the page that pops up after you've completed your meditation to now show your total number of meditations and your challenge status.

Also we're excited to announce that we've added a new language---Bienvenue French! :) If you'd like to listen to your meditations in French from now on, simply go to your Profile and change your language to French.

And finally, we'll end our update with a quote that resonates with us:
"In the end, people will judge you anyway. So don’t live your life impressing others. Live your life impressing yourself."
Eunice Camacho Infante
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

We have a new profile page where you can track your progress and mindful points. You can also access the Profile from the bottom tab. On top of that, we have a new feature: Mindful Meter. A Mindful Meter is a smart measurement scale that shows you how mentally and emotionally resilient you are based on your usage. Try to reach 100 points!

We have a new profile page where you can track your progress and mindful points. You can also access the Profile from the bottom tab. On top of that, we have a new feature: Mindful Meter. A Mindful Meter is a smart measurement scale that shows you how mentally and emotionally resilient you are based on your usage. Try to reach 100 points!
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

You asked: “How can I turn meditation into a habit?” As a response, we improved the reminder system. Now you can easily set reminder after completing a session. In addition to that, we improved user experience and eliminated some bugs, as always.

In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

We'll end our update with a quote that resonates with us:
In the end, people will judge you anyway. So don’t live your life impressing others. Live your life impressing yourself.
Eunice Camacho Infante"

Although we all want to slow down in this fast pace of life; we also want our meditations and music to load quickly and give you the best experience possible. That's why we've been working hard on making sure your Meditopian experience is optimized to load quickly and play seamlessly. Just open any content and see what happens. It will blow your mind.

Here is the quote of the update: You are strong when you know your weaknesses. You are beautiful when you appreciate your flaws. You are wise when you learn from your mistakes.

Take care of yourself.

In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

Introducing Meditopia Sleep!
In Meditopia, we are working day and night to bring the best experience to you in your daily life. Considering the we spend 30% of our lives sleeping, helping you to sleep better have become a priority for us. That is why we created a new sleep page with new meditations, sleep stories and sleep music to help you get a better sleep at night.

Sleep Meditations
Listen more than 30 mindfulness meditations that include visualization, which will help you to drift into a restful sleep.

Sleep Stories
Sleep like a baby at night like you used to do with new stories section. Enjoy fairy tales, go to dream worlds and drift away from your recurring thoughts in the dream world.

Sleep Music
Listen relaxing music, which will relax your mind and body from start to end.

Now update the app and sleep like a baby tonight.

How are you feeling today?

We have a question: Do you like the daily quotes you receive? We just love them. They help us to start a day with inspiration and spirit. That is why our engineering, product and content teams worked hard
to give you more inspiration and a tool for self-realization.

Now you can read a more detailed explanation of every inspirational quote you receive and take note to related questions that help you to contemplate.

If you still did not listen to new Sleep Stories, don't forget to check it out tonight. You will drift into a deep dreamy state.

Besides this, of course, we worked mindfully to improve the app and removed all problems and bugs we were able to detect.

This update's quote: "Don’t judge yourself by your past. You don’t live there anymore."

Meditopia Team

A new section is just released: Blogs! We believe that there’s no limit for collecting inspiration no matter where you are. Whether be at home, in the office or on the road, now, with this update, you’ll be able to access inspirational, mindful and informative podcasts, written articles and audio content.

In this version, we've made some improvements on the Home Page to allow easier access to all content. Now, you can access the content you need at the right time, and discover our content world more deeply. Following this update, daily inspirations, blogs, sleep stories and many more will be available over the Home Page. With this new design, we hope you’ll be able to find everything you’re looking for in an easier way in these hard times.
Your Meditopia Family

Hello! We are excited to be launching the top quality meditation and mindfulness app in Italian. Meditopia contents are prepared by top scientists, practitioners and combined with outstanding musical experiences. We are here to bring a new, fresh perspective to mindfulness and meditation experience. From now on, we will get better and grow together, every day in every way. So please feel free to send us your comments or desires from hi@meditopia.com and see how we apply them quickly:) Now, sit back, relax and start your incredible  and life changing transformation journey.

So please feel free to send us your comments or desires from hi@meditopia.com and see how we apply them quickly:) Now, sit back, relax and start your incredible  and life changing transformation journey.
We have a great news for you! Meditopia is now available on iPad. Enjoy our all contents on the big screen.
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

We started the year with an exciting new idea: “The 20 Days for 2020 Challenge”. Those who took part greatly benefited from the support of the Meditopia community. Since then, we've released a new challenge every month and they continue to be a hit! To make this experience even more interactive, and strength our community bond, we are now announcing "Live Challenges!" Now, you can join a live challenge every month with the support of our community while keeping your private mental space.

We're back with our latest update! As summer ends, we have made new enhancements to the app as we continue to stand by your side as we adjust to the new normal. We have added article suggestions at the end of meditations to inspire you and enhance your knowledge. You can also keep track of your progress towards achieving your personal goals, and keep up your motivation. And here is the big news! Our German version is back with a new voice and meditation programs!

We always keep up with the latest developments! Now, we're all set for iOS14 and its exciting new features! We are closer to you than ever, as you can use Meditopia directly on your Home Screen! We're literally one click away! In seconds, you can start meditations picked out just for you based on your daily routine.

Want to hear some good news for a change? And let's be honest, there's no such thing as too much good news! Well, here you go! So, here you go! You've all been wondering if you could search for a topic and find the related content in the App... well, now you can! Just type any keyword into the search function in the App to access all sorts of related content. Come on, don't wait! Enjoy meditations, sleep stories, music and blog articles on the topics you are searching for!
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.
In this update, we fixed several bugs and made improvements to enhance the customer experience for you.

As we bid farewell to this year and welcome 2021, here's a great 2020 memory for all Meditopians! We've taken one more step towards spreading mindfulness and bringing inner resilience, serenity and balance into peoples' lives all over the world. Our Arabic version is now live! The addition of each language to our family confirms that "we're stronger together". We will keep working to bring the most localized content to everyone. Until then, enjoy our meditations, sleep stories and music.

Anyone else love their Apple Watch? Does it make your life easier, and help you with your daily routines? Well then, we have the best news! From today, you can access all our talks and sleep content via your watch! If you've got a few spare minutes and would like to learn more about mindfulness, or just can't seem to fall asleep, then check out our updated Apple Watch library!

What's the one thing better than a relaxing breathing exercise? Four different breathing exercises! Well then, it's our mindful pleasure to introduce you to three new breathing techniques: Focus, unwind, and energize.

It's not just the techniques though, we're talking about a richer user experience here with haptic and audio guidance. You see, we've been working on this for quite a while just to make sure everything works in a user-friendly way.

Enjoy and take a deep breath! Catch you guys on the next one.
